item.description:
(This event is organized by Frank Simard; please contact him with any questions.)

This will be an educational, artistic nude shoot from noon to 4pm. Lighting to accomplish the artistic effect with the female body is the subject of this session.

Models will be Phylactere MM 1154401, Mia D MM 223676, and Melissa MM 716797. These models will provide photographers attending with the exceptional subject posing seldom found in one outstanding session. The studio is large enough so that each of the three models can be working with a different photographer at the same time.

To provide a good photographer/model ratio, this shoot is limited to 12 photographers.

The cost to participate in this event as a photographer is $149; the cost will rise to $179 if not paid by February 9. We reserve the right to remove RSVPs if payment is not received within a reasonable time after the RSVP is made.

DON'T MISS THIS ONE!
item.name: Lighting - Artistic and Lace: A Time On Task Learning Event
